metadata.description: Archaia adds a new children's book to its library with Martin Cendreda's An Apple and An Adventure, which uses rhyme and the ABCs to create an engaging world of wonder that's both educational and fun. A young cave girl and her triceratops set out on an adventure from A to Z and make new friends along the way—galloping goliaths, nine newts, petite plesiosaurs, and more greet them on their journey through the alphabet!
metadata.name: An Apple and An Adventure
